Detailed Description

Implements FTDIDriver DeviceFS driver incl. IOTCL Operations.

Define Documentation

#define DeviceFSCallDevice_MonitorRX   0x0D

Function Documentation

_kernel_oserror* driver_internal (  struct common_structure *  common,
_kernel_swi_regs *  regs,
void *  pw
) 
 

The device driver for DeviceFS-Operations. For it requires access to common structure which is not provided by the interface, there is a small adapter inside ftdimodule.c which adds this information and calls this function then.

_kernel_oserror* perform_ioctl (  struct ftdi_device_structure *  ftdi_device,
int *  ioctl_block
) 
 

Performs IOCTL Operations determined by a given IOCTL_Block on a given FTDI Device. Returns NULL if all ok or a pointer to a RISC OS error block.
